descriptions.description: Pepper gives information about known products. --NOT TO BE RELEASED as prices are shown...-- Known codes: 3760067310005: Chocolate muffin 3760067310012: Red dress 7057070070429: Super phone Any other code will show info about NAO. Swipe tablet to right to edit product information.

Pepper gives information about known products. --NOT TO BE RELEASED as prices are shown...-- Known codes: 3760067310005: Chocolate muffin 3760067310012: Red dress 7057070070429: Super phone Any other code will show info about NAO. Swipe tablet to right to edit product information.

Pepper da información acerca de los productos conocidos. --NOT TO BE RELEASED as prices are shown...-- Productos conocidos: 3760067310005: Magdalena de chocolate 3760067310012: Vestido rojo 7057070070429: Súper teléfono Cualquier otro código muestra información sobre NAO. Pase para la tableta derecho a editar la información del producto.

Pepper donne les infos sur divers produits --NOT TO BE RELEASED as prices are shown...-- Produits connus : 3760067310005: Muffin au chocolat 3760067310012: Robe rouge 7057070070429: Super téléphone N'importe quel autre code donnera des informations sur NAO. Glisser sur la tablette vers la droite permettra d'éditer les informations d'un produit.
